price: (26) And those who disbelieve say, "Do not listen to this Qur’ān and speak noisily[1391] during [the recitation of] it that perhaps you will overcome."
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَا تَسۡمَعُواْ لِهَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَٱلۡغَوۡاْ فِيهِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَغۡلِبُونَ
footnotes: [1391]- Other meanings include "speak improperly" and/or "make a clamor."  The purpose of this was to prevent the hearing or understanding of the Qur’ān.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna kafarū lā tasmaʿū lihādhā al-qur'āni wal-ghaw fīhi laʿallakum taghlibūna
